name: The Day before Christmas (theLORDofMUESLI, Chiibi)
description:
The Day before Christmas

This is our submission to the Cozy Winter Jam 2022!

In our game you control a bunch of elfs, who have trouble getting the gifts ready on the day before christmas. They move along on a conveyor belt through the Christmas Factory.

Each elf on its own is too weak to carry the gift, so two adjacent ones need to hold it up together. If the gift gets stuck on something however or an elf holding it needs to dodge an obstacle, the gift is lost!

In order to avoid that from happening, move the gift around between the elfs.

But be careful! The factory gets more complicated and filled up with obstacles as time goes on and the conveyor belts ramp up at a steady speed. How long can you keep the gift from dropping?

Controls

W,A,S,D → rotate the selected elf

Space → Swap selected elf

Credits

All assets, except for the audio were created by us (Robin @Chiibi and Sven @theLORDofMUESLI)
